content.question: The polar function <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></math>, where <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses equals 1 minus 2 cos open parentheses negative theta close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>, is graphed in the polar coordinate system.
